resources.string: In Your presence, there is fullness of joy- Psalms 16:11
Daughter of the King || Redhead || Travel Enthusiast || Lover of all things pink || Woman in STEM!

A family photo... nice. My family has a small rodeo equipment manufacturing business that has been around for nearly 60 years! This summer, I spent my time building them a new website and traveling around the country as their content creator. Over 10,000 miles by myself. Fun story: I got caught in a bad storm through Kansas, and I felt like Dorothy on the Wizard of Oz. I stopped in a small tire store and the owner said to me, "Youre never going to get anywhere if you stop for a little rain. What a great life motto!
